label: Dispense Height (mm) Above Bottom of Well
name: dispense_height

label: Aspirate Height (mm) Above Bottom of Well
name: aspirate_height

label: Radius for Touch Tip (decimal fraction of well radius)
name: touch_radius

name: touch_speed

name: tip_max

name: reservoir_fill_volume
